div.div: at Rochester, NY | Edwin Fauver Stadium

tr.td: Hobart wins toss and defers. UR to receive at hill end of field.
Will Warne kickoff 65 yards to the ROC0, touchback.
Shane Saucier rush for 6 yards to the ROC31 (Trayvon Toney).
Justin Redfern pass incomplete to Jacob Milberger.
